RESOLVED_ENTITIES.Southern District of Texas: United States District Court for the Southern District of Texas

AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.United States District Court for the Sou: held a preliminary examination hearing in the case of Yusif Ahmed Rufied and found probable cause to hold him
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Immigration and Customs Enforcement (ICE: presented Agent Bruce Henderson as its sole witness at the preliminary examination hearing and interviewed Martin Adaboh
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.United States Border Patrol: conducted a check point on Highway 59 where sixty undocumented aliens were found in a tractor trailer and stopped Yusif Ahmed Rufied
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Monterrey Inn: location where Yusif Ahmed Rufied and Martin Adaboh stayed, and where Martin Adaboh was approached to smuggle aliens
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Diesel Impact 2000: location where aliens were loaded into the tractor trailer and where Martin Adaboh described the surrounding area to Agent Bruce Henderson
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.United States: country with a magistrate judge system
